item.potatosmpx.wood_wand.desc: Basic wand for learning simple spells.
item.potatosmpx.stone_wand.desc: Sturdy wand with increased magical capacity.
item.potatosmpx.titanium_wand.desc: Rare wand for awe-inspiring magic feats.
item.potatosmpx.hero_wand.desc: Ultimate wand for the greatest of wizards.
item.potatosmpx.raw_titanium.desc: Unrefined titanium ore, requiring smelting to extract its valuable ingot.
item.potatosmpx.titanium_ingot.desc: A strong, lightweight metal prized for its durability and versatile uses in crafting.
item.potatosmpx.titanium_nugget.desc: Small fragments of titanium, often used for crafting finer details or combining to form an ingot.
item.potatosmpx.steel_ingot.desc: A reliable alloy of iron and carbon, known for its strength and resilience in various crafting applications.
block.potatosmpx.titanium_block.desc: A block of titanium, a strong, lightweight metal prized for its durability and versatile uses in crafting.
block.potatosmpx.steel_block.desc: A block of steel, a reliable alloy of iron and carbon, known for its strength and resilience in various crafting applications.
block.potatosmpx.titanium_ore.desc: A rare ore containing titanium, a strong, lightweight metal prized for its durability and versatile uses in crafting.
enchantment.potatosmpx.blast_mastery.des: 5% chance per level to auto-blast furnace blocks and dupe drops.
enchantment.potatosmpx.smoke_mastery.des: 5% chance per level to auto-smoke killed entities and dupe drops.
item.potatosmpx.compressed_mana_shard.de: A shard of a mana crystal.
block.potatosmpx.mana_crystal_ore.desc: A rare ore containing mana crystals.
item.potatosmpx.hero_axe.desc: Ultimate axe for the greatest of warriors.
enchantment.potatosmpx.beheading.desc: 5% chance per level for entity head drops.
enchantment.potatosmpx.ore_compactor.des: Auto-block ores; 2% chance per level for extra block.
enchantment.potatosmpx.thunder_strike.de: 6% chance per level to strike target with lightning.
enchantment.potatosmpx.satiety.desc: 10% chance per level to replenish hunger upon entity kill.
enchantment.potatosmpx.swift_strike.desc: 5% chance per level for double weapon swing.
enchantment.potatosmpx.ender_mind.desc: Teleport away when health < 4 hearts upon hit.
enchantment.potatosmpx.wisdom.desc: Multiplies XP from blocks & kills by enchantment level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.glimmering.desc: Piglins won't target you (gold armor effect).
enchantment.potatosmpx.god_of_thunder.de: 5% chance for lightning strike on target.
enchantment.potatosmpx.venomous_strike.d: Poison enemies on hit, with poison duration and damage scaling with enchantment level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.nocturnal.desc: Turn invisible for 5 seconds when hit at night.
enchantment.potatosmpx.arctic_storm.desc: 0.01% chance per level to freeze area (15x15 + 5x5 per level) & players (10s).
0.0001% chance per level to create a portal to another dimension, sucking in nearby entities and items.
enchantment.potatosmpx.soul_reaper.desc: 5% chance on kill to steal player's skill levels (10% at Lv 2). Excludes prestiges.
enchantment.potatosmpx.tidal_wave.desc: 3% chance per level to summon a wave, pushing back enemies upon hit.
enchantment.potatosmpx.cold_blooded.desc: Protects user from freezing or slowness effects.
enchantment.potatosmpx.bountiful_harvest: Increases crop drop rate by 10% per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.nimble_feet.desc: Increases movement speed by 5% per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.quick_strike.desc: Increases attack speed by 5% per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.stonebreaker.desc: Increases mining speed for stone-based blocks by 10% per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.lucky_strike.desc: Increases chance of getting rare drops by 5% per level when mining or killing mobs.
enchantment.potatosmpx.farmers_delight.d: Increases chance of getting rare drops from crops by 5% per level; may drop random ores like diamonds.
enchantment.potatosmpx.blazing_aura.desc: 1% chance per level upon hit to create fiery aura damaging nearby enemies (damage increases with level).
enchantment.potatosmpx.airborne.desc: Increases jump height by 1 block per level and reduces fall damage by 25% per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.arcane_shield.des: Absorbs 50% of damage taken, converting it into experience points.
enchantment.potatosmpx.curse_of_misfortu: 10% chance on hit to curse enemies, reducing their luck and causing fewer item drops.
enchantment.potatosmpx.shield_breaker.de: Ignores 25% of target's armor when attacking, dealing more damage to heavily armored enemies.
enchantment.potatosmpx.paralysis.desc: 5% chance per level to freeze target and reduce attack speed for 3 seconds upon hit.
enchantment.potatosmpx.poison_aspect.des: Poisons target on hit, with poison duration and damage scaling with enchantment level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.pumpkin_head.desc: Allows staring at Endermen without provoking aggression, like wearing a pumpkin.
enchantment.potatosmpx.pyromania.desc: Deals 10% extra damage per level to entities on fire.
enchantment.potatosmpx.replenish.desc: Automatically consumes seeds and replants crops when broken.
enchantment.potatosmpx.rise.desc: 5% chance per level on hit to make the target float for 3 seconds.
enchantment.potatosmpx.shotgun.desc: Deals up to 15% extra damage per level based on proximity to the target.
enchantment.potatosmpx.sniper.desc: Deals up to 15% extra damage per level based on distance from the target.
enchantment.potatosmpx.sugar_rush.desc: On killing an entity, gain 5% movement speed and 1 extra jump height per level for 5 seconds.
enchantment.potatosmpx.tank.desc: Grants 10% protection per level from unblockable and armor-bypassing damage, and 2 extra hearts per level.
enchantment.potatosmpx.lifestealer.desc: Grants a chance to heal the user for a portion of the damage dealt to enemies, with a 2% chance per level to heal for double the amount.
enchantment.potatosmpx.momentum.desc: Increases mining speed by 5% per level after mining consecutive blocks.
enchantment.potatosmpx.quake.desc: 3% chance per level to shatter stone-based blocks in a 3x3 area, without losing durability.
enchantment.potatosmpx.detonation.desc: 5% chance per level for arrows to explode upon impact, dealing AoE damage.
enchantment.potatosmpx.elemental_mastery: 3% chance per level for a random elemental effect on hit (fire, ice, lightning, poison).
enchantment.potatosmpx.divine_blessing.d: 7% chance per level to completely negate damage.
enchantment.potatosmpx.windfury.desc: 5% chance per level for a whirlwind attack, hitting multiple enemies.
enchantment.potatosmpx.vampiric_touch.de: 5% chance per level to steal life from targets, healing the user.
enchantment.potatosmpx.deep_miner.desc: Increases mining speed by 5% per level when below Y=32.
enchantment.potatosmpx.earth_mover.desc: 10% chance per level to excavate a 3x3 area.
enchantment.potatosmpx.bounty_hunter.des: 5% chance per level to double mob loot drops.
enchantment.potatosmpx.aerial_affinity.d: Increases flight speed and reduces durability loss when flying.
enchantment.potatosmpx.withering_strikes: 5% chance per level to inflict Wither effect on hit.
